review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Item 18: Gemini Enter delay fix. Full integration review â€” traced constant from constants.js through terminal.js to injection.js. Delay (75ms) is ONLY in Gemini PTY branch (line 531). Claude/Codex paths untouched. Default fallback in destructuring. Edge cases: promise interruption safe (safety timer releases lock), rapid sequential injections safe (175ms spacing with retry). Pre-existing concurrent dequeue noted as separate issue. Tests correctly advance fake timers. Confidence HIGH.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
